text: on April 8th 1908 the Harvard Business
School was created it was at the time a

teach people the ability to see the
whole it's an incredible quality of

HBS classroom is the epitome of that

to have a part in the lives of these

take pride most pride in it is our
alumni the extraordinary achievements
the extraordinary achievements that all
have you have made leaders around the
globe need to stand up tell the truth
but also Inspire confidence the job of a
leader is not to to make the decision is
to make sure the best decision is made I
promise I will act with utmost integrity
and pursue my work in an ethical manner
will safeguard the interests of my
shareholders co-workers customers and
the society in which we operate I will
manage my Enterprise in good faith
guarding against decisions and behavior
that advise my own narrow Ambitions but
harm the Enterprise the enduring
strengths of this school are the

and every year they are the outstanding
faculty committed to teaching
committed to a research program that's
relevant to practice it is the engaged

transformational education takes place
but the ultimate asset of the school are
its alumni what they do in their careers
is what really counts the positions of
leadership that they attain leadership
with a large L and Leadership with a

leadership in small entrepreneurial
Ventures leadership in their communities
